text: Ezɨ Krais Iesus kamaghsua ifonge, gumazamiziba bar kamaghɨn fogh, a gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar asughasugha nɨmɨra me gamua zui. Kamagh amizɨ a faragha nan apangkufi, ezɨ kɨ an ababanimɨn mɨn iti, eghtɨ a na gamizir biziba men akaghtɨ me dar ganɨva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikɨva, ikɨrɨmɨrir ikia mamaghɨra itim iniam.
